pullrequest.title: Use random partition names in testing

content.raw:
I created a branch named `fix_tests` with all the fixes. I ran it locally and all tests passed for me (it takes a while). I tried the `handsim-any-devel-trusty-amd64-docker_test` in jenkins but [something is not working there](http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/handsim/job/handsim-any-devel-trusty-amd64-docker_test/52/console). @_jrivero_ , could you check if there is a problem in the Jenkins job?

In the meantime, you can try this branch locally.
content.html:
I created a branch named fix_tests with all the fixes. I ran it locally and all tests passed for me (it takes a while). I tried the handsim-any-devel-trusty-amd64-docker_test in jenkins but something is not working there. @jrivero , could you check if there is a problem in the Jenkins job?

In the meantime, you can try this branch locally.
